Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for character dialogues.

msgId.Wiki: The text ID for the message this line of dialogue should display as subtitles.

voiceId.Wiki: The voice ID for this line of dialogue.

motionId.Wiki: The animation the character speaking this line of dialogue should use during playback.

returnPos.Wiki: The relative position of conversation to return when returning to a conversation.

reactionId.Wiki: The reaction ID to use when returning to a conversation.

eventId.Wiki: The event ID to use when returning to a conversation.

isMotionLoop.Wiki: If ON, the motion animation is looped for this line of dialogue.
